$$$LIST.text:
FROM 'TSAZF.CBT.ALZ.DYNAMIC.ISPGLIB'
    ISFCMDS  - Shop over-rides to IBM's SDSF Commands
    ISPCFIGU - Shop ISPF Configuration over-rides. Input to ISPCCONF

    ISR@PRIM - DTL for Dynamic ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISPDLANG - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISPDMENU - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISPDUTIL - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUEN - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUL1 - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUL2 - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUL3 - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUOP - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUTI - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUVC - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISR@PUVD - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISRZPRAB - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel
    ISRZPRIM - DTL Include for ISR@PRIM ISPF Primary Selection Panel

    PLPACMDS - Updates to PLP's ISPF CMDS Table (because of Shop CMDS)

    SHP1CMDS - Shop Command Table 1 (IBM Base Product CMDS)
    SHP2CMDS - Shop Command Table 2 (3rd Part Product & Shop App CMDS)
    SHP3CMDS - Shop Command Table 3 (Group Level CMDS, e.g. Techie)

    USR1CMDS - Personal Command Table 1

<abc pdcvar=isr@opt>Menu
    <pdc unavail=zpm1 acc1=ctrl acc2=S><m>Settings
      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=SET>
    <pdc unavail=zpm2 acc1=ctrl acc2=V><m>View

    <pdc unavail=zpm3 acc1=ctrl acc2=E><m>Edit
      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=ED1>

      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=C1>

      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=DAL>
    <pdc unavail=zpm8 acc1=ctrl acc2=W>ISPF <m>Workplace
      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=WRK>
    <pdc unavail=zpmS acc1=ctrl acc2=A>Status <m>Area...
      <action run=ISRROUTE parm=SAM>
    <pdsep>
    <pdc acc1=ctrl acc2=X>E<m>xit
      <action run=EXIT>
  <:-- Logoff and Logon require the TSOEXEC ISPF Cmd to be available -->
    <pdc acc1=ctrl acc2=O>Logoff TS<m>O
      <action run=LOGOFF>
    <pdc acc1=ctrl acc2=L><m>Logon Again...
      <action run=LOGON parm=&ZUSER>
  <:-- Logoff and Logon require the TSOEXEC ISPF Cmd to be available -->
  </abc>

ISR@PRIM.text:
<:-- ISR@PRIM selection menu -->
<:doctype dm system(
  <:ENTITY ispdmenu system>
  <:ENTITY ispdlang system>
  <:ENTITY ispdutil system>
  <:ENTITY isrzprab system -- common action bar imbed -->
  <:ENTITY isrzprim system -- common logic file imbed -->

<:-- * * * * * * * * * * ISR@PRIM Customization * * * * * * * * * * *-->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- If you want to hide UNAVAILable options on the panel:           -->
<:--    - Compile this DTL                                           -->
<:--    - Edit the ISR@PRIM Panel that results                       -->
<:--    - Do a "C 'UNAVAIL(ON)' 'UNAVAIL(ON) INTENS(NON)' ALL"       -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- Also, to avoid displaying the wrong selection option when the   -->
<:--    last 'UNAVAIL(ON)' selection is choosen after choosing       -->
<:--    an 'UNAVAIL(ON)' option and not re-ENTERing the screen       -->
<:--    between the choices (also more efficient), change:           -->
<:--  IF (&SELALL='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, A B)   -->
<:--  IF (&SELMRK='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, M)     -->
<:--  IF (&SELDEV='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, D)     -->
<:--  IF (&SELOMVS='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, O)    -->
<:--  IF (&SELOPR='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, OP)    -->
<:--  IF (&SELSYSP='1' & VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB)) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, SP)   -->
<:--     to:                                                         -->
<:--  IF (VER(&ZCMDCHK,NB))                                          -->
<:--     IF (&SELALL='1' ) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, A B)                  -->
<:--     IF (&SELMRK='1' ) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, M)                    -->
<:--     IF (&SELDEV='1' ) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, D)                    -->
<:--     IF (&SELOMVS='1') VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, O)                    -->
<:--     IF (&SELOPR='1' ) VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, OP)                   -->
<:--     IF (&SELSYSP='1') VER(&ZCMDCHK,LISTX, SP)                   -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- The following ENTITYs define members shipped in the ISPGMLI     -->
<:-- library that are provided for customization purposes.           -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- Except for the panel title line (member ISR@PUTI),              -->
<:-- each member contains only comments to outline the type of       -->
<:-- tag(s) to be used in that member.                               -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- The ENTITY, VARCLASS, VARDCL and CHOICE files are included      -->
<:-- after all standard ISR@PRIM definitions. Three panel logic      -->
<:-- files are provided to add logic (1) before any standard ISR@PRIM-->
<:-- logic, (2) after ISR@PRIM logic but before the ZSEL generated   -->
<:-- statement, or (3) after the ZSEL generated statement.           -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- The ISPGMLI members and their functions are:                    -->
<:--   isr@puen - ENTITY imbed                                       -->
<:--   isr@puvc - VARCLASS/XLATL/CHECK tags                          -->
<:--   isr@puvd - VARDCL tags                                        -->
<:--   isr@puop - CHOICE/ACTION tags                                 -->
<:--   isr@pul1 - panel logic / SOURCE tags (1)                      -->
<:--   isr@pul2 - panel logic / SOURCE tags (2)                      -->
<:--   isr@pul3 - panel logic / SOURCE tags (3)                      -->
<:--   isr@puti - panel title line                                   -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- To use this customization feature, either:                      -->
<:--   1. Create your own members using the same member names and    -->
<:--      place them in a local library.                             -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:--              ... or ...                                         -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:--   2. Create your own members using any member name in a local   -->
<:--      library. Change the member names in the following ENTITY   -->
<:--      definitions to specify your local member names.            -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- Concatenate the local library in front of the ISPF product      -->
<:-- libraries in your ISPDTLC JCL or on the ISPDTLC invocation      -->
<:-- panel.                                                          -->
<:--                                                                 -->
<:--    ISR@PRIM entity    ISPGMLI                                   -->
<:--    internal name      member name                               -->
<:--          |                |                                     -->
  <:ENTITY loclenti system "isr@puen" -- ENTITY imbed                -->
  <:ENTITY loclvarc system "isr@puvc" -- VARCLASS/XLATL/CHECK tags   -->
  <:ENTITY loclvard system "isr@puvd" -- VARDCL tags                 -->
  <:ENTITY loclopts system "isr@puop" -- CHOICE/ACTION tags          -->
  <:ENTITY locllog1 system "isr@pul1" -- panel logic / <SOURCE> tags -->
  <:ENTITY locllog2 system "isr@pul2" -- panel logic / <SOURCE> tags -->
  <:ENTITY locllog3 system "isr@pul3" -- panel logic / <SOURCE> tags -->
  <:ENTITY locltitl system "isr@puti" -- panel title line tags       -->
<:-- End of customization ENTITY definitions.                        -->

ISRZPRIM.text:
<:--                                                                 -->
<:-- common logic include for panel ISR@PRIM                         -->
<:--                                                                 -->
  <dtacol>

    <:-- special )INIT section processing follows                   -->
    <source type=init>
.CURSOR = ZCMD
&TMPROWS = &ZSDATA
&TMPSHDW = &ZSSHDW
IF (&ZHILITE = YES OR &ZGUI ¬= &Z)
  .ATTRCHAR(19)='PAS(ON) COLOR(WHITE)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1A)='PAS(ON) COLOR(RED)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1B)='PAS(ON) COLOR(BLUE)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1C)='PAS(ON) COLOR(GREEN)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1D)='PAS(ON) COLOR(PINK)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1E)='PAS(ON) COLOR(YELLOW)'
  .ATTRCHAR(1F)='PAS(ON) COLOR(TURQ)'
IF (&ZGUI ¬= &Z AND &ZGUI ¬= 'CLIENT')
  &ZPASICON = 'ON'
  &ZPASTEXT = 'OFF'
  IF (&ZSCREEN = '1')
    VGET (ZSAREA1)
    &ZSAREA = &ZSAREA1
    GOTO Q
  IF (&ZSCREEN = '2')
    VGET (ZSAREA2)
    &ZSAREA = &ZSAREA2
    GOTO Q
  IF (&ZSCREEN = '3')
    VGET (ZSAREA3)
    &ZSAREA = &ZSAREA3
    GOTO Q
  IF (&ZSCREEN = '4')
    VGET (ZSAREA4)
    &ZSAREA = &ZSAREA4
    GOTO Q
  ELSE
    VGET (ZSAREA5)
    &ZSAREA = &ZSAREA5
  Q:
  &zcstf = 0                   /* initialize Status AB unavail flags */
  IF (&ZSAREA = 'OFF') &zcstf = 1
ELSE
  &ZPASICON = 'OFF'
  &ZPASTEXT = 'ON'
VGET (ZSCML ZSCBR ZSCED ZTAPPLID) PROFILE /*   @V6A*/
IF (&ZSCML = ' ') &ZSCML = 'PAGE'        /*                      @V6A */
IF (&ZSCBR  = ' ') &ZSCBR = 'PAGE'       /*                      @V6A */
IF (&ZSCED  = ' ') &ZSCED = 'PAGE'       /*                      @V6A */
IF (&ZTAPPLID = ' ') &ZTAPPLID = 'ISR'
VPUT (ZSCML ZSCBR ZSCED ZTAPPLID) PROFILE /*   @V6A*/
&ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
&ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
&ZSCLMPRJ = &Z      /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE     @L1A*/
IF (&ZLOGO = 'YES')                                     /* CK@MJC*/
  IF (&ZSPLIT = 'NO')      /* Not in split screen            @L5A*/
    IF (&ZCMD = &Z)        /* No command pending             @L5A*/
      IF (&ZLOGOPAN ¬= 'DONE') /* No logo displayed yet      @L5A*/
        .MSG = ISRLO999    /* Set logo information           @L5A*/
        .RESP = ENTER      /* Simulate enter                 @L5A*/
        &ZLOGOPAN = 'DONE' /*                                @L5A*/
        &ZCLEAN = 'NO'     /*                                @L5A*/
    IF (&ZCMD ¬= &Z) &ZLOGOPAN = 'DONE'   /* command pending @L5A*/
    VPUT (ZLOGOPAN) SHARED /*                                @L5A*/
  IF (&ZSPLIT = 'YES') &ZLOGOPAN = 'DONE'
VPUT (ZHTOP,ZHINDEX,ZSCLMPRJ) PROFILE
IF (&ZCSTF = 1)   /* Status area = None */
  &ZIMGNAM ='ISPFGIFL'
  &ZIMGROW =3
ELSE
  &ZIMGNAM ='ISPFGIFS'
  &ZIMGROW =15
&ZIMGCOL =56
    </source>

    <:-- special )REINIT section processing follows                 -->
    <source type=reinit>
.CURSOR = ZCMD
VGET (ZTAPPLID) PROFILE       /*                 Z41@MEA*/
IF (&ZTAPPLID = ' ') &ZTAPPLID = 'ISR'        /* Z41@MEA*/
    </source>

    <:-- special )PROC section processing follows                   -->
    <source type=proc>
IF (&ZCSTF='1') .ATTR(GRPBOX1) = 'WIDTH(0)'
IF (.CURSOR = TMPROWS AND &ZCMD = ' ')
 &ZSAR  =TRANS(&ZSCREEN 1,&ZSAREA1 2,&ZSAREA2 3,&ZSAREA3 4,&ZSAREA4 *,&ZSAREA5)
 IF (&ZSAR = 'CAL','UPS','SES') &ZCMD = 'SX'
    </source>
  </dtacol>
<:--                                                                 -->

  <:-- =============================================== ZOP ======= -->
  <cmd name=ZOP
      altdescr="Quick-Path to Operations Functions Menu">
    <cmdact action=
     "SELECT CMD(%PLPISPF /SYS OPER &ZPARM) SCRNAME(SYSPAPPS) NEWAPPL(PLP)">

  <:-- =============================================== ZSP ======= -->
  <cmd name=ZSP
      altdescr="Quick-Path to System Programmer Functions Menu">
    <cmdact action=
     "SELECT CMD(%PLPISPF /SYS &ZPARM) SCRNAME(SYSPAPPS) NEWAPPL(PLP)">

</cmdtbl>

USR1CMDS.text:
<:-- ===== Source for ISPF command table USR1CMDS ****************-->
<:doctype dm system>
<cmdtbl applid=USR#>
 <:-- ============================================================ -->
 <:-- Generated 28 Jan 2016 by ISPCMDTB EXEC.                      -->
 <:-- ============================================================ -->
 <:--          Alias entries must preceed other entries.           -->
 <:-- ============================================================ -->
 <:-- Personel ISPF Commands. Place in ISPF PROFILE DSN.           -->
 <:-- ============================================================ -->

  <:-- =============================================== ACMDLIST == -->
  <cmd name=ACMDLIST
      altdescr="Display the selected ISPF Command List">ACMDL<T>IST
    <cmdact action=
        "SELECT CMD(%CMDLIST &ZPARM) SCRNAME(CMDLIST) NEWAPPL(ISR)">

  <:-- =============================================== DATEX ===== -->
  <cmd name=DATEX
      altdescr="Display Date Information">
    <cmdact action="SELECT CMD(%DATEX &ZPARM) NEWAPPL(ISP)">

  <:-- ================================================ DTL ====== -->
  <cmd name=DTLcomp
          altdescr="ISPF Dialog Tag Language Compile">DTL<T>comp
    <cmdact action=
       "SELECT CMD(%ISPDTLC) NEWAPPL(ISR) SUSPEND SCRNAME(ISPDTLC)">

  <:-- =============================================== JCL ======= -->
  <cmd name=JCL
      altdescr="Start Edit session on personal Z.CNTL library">
    <cmdact action="SELECT CMD(%ED Z.CNTL(&ZPARM)) NEWAPPL(ISP)">

  <:-- =============================================== WHOHAS ==== -->
  <cmd name=WHOHAS
      altdescr="Who has enques on a GRS Resource">WHOH<T>AS
    <cmdact action=
               "SELECT CMD(%WHOHAS &ZPARM) SUSPEND SCRNAME(WHOHAS)">

  <:-- =============================================== XL ======== -->
  <cmd name=XL
      altdescr="Fast-Path to DSLIST">
    <cmdact action=
              "SELECT PGM(XL) PARM(&ZPARM) SUSPEND SCRNAME(DSLIST)">
</cmdtbl>
